query:
INSERT INTO public.investment_preferences
            (user_id, risk_tolerance, investment_horizon, investment_mode, investment_goal, ai_enabled)
            VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6)
            ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE
            SET 
                risk_tolerance     = $2,
                investment_horizon = $3,
                investment_mode    = $4,
                investment_goal    = $5,
                ai_enabled         = $6
